title: Nice little game
comment: My 2 1/2 year old daughter really enjoys it. But ... you say it's open source (GPLv3) but where is the sources? I cannot find anything on your web-site (and the search function is broken, as are the archives). I presume that you're using the same code for this as for the Memory Game for Kids - so it would be nice if one could customize the tiles. 5 stars once the source code is available :-)
Love the artwork and game addictive and helps your memory
So nice to see a good game not requiring network access, phone state and identity, etc that so many other suspicious games require. Nicely done too.

title: Fun & Free (no ads)
comment: Finally a memory game that that is just that, a memory game. No need for full internet connetion or to know my location...and no ads. The images are great and it is really meant for tablets. It is a good challenge for my 2.5 year old. Plus she can play it on the plane without wireles or home without ending in some garbage page that offers to review her credit score.
